channel.title: [614]SER File extension on char files[614]
channel.description:
So whenever a character is created on my server, the char file is saved as a .SER file. How do i fix this? I'm no to anything newer then 317's, chich ive spent most of my server creating and hosting career working on.
Matt MNMScape Owner

item.title: [614]SER File extension on char files[614]
item.dc:creator: @MnMMatthew MnMMatthew
item.description:
@MnMMatthew wrote:

laurent 248:

if u coded a 317 only, don’t try a 614, its really not like a 317.

Its called learning something new bud. Thats like saying “You havent done a 317 before dont bother trying.” It just takes time worknig with it to get it right.

[quote=“Junes, post:3, topic:362499”][quote author=laurent 248 link=topic=458789.msg3356949#msg3356949 date=1285988694]
if u coded a 317 only, don’t try a 614, its really not like a 317.
[/quote]

or he could start working to learn how to do 614 its not stupidly hard if he wants a challenge… short answer i believe you cant[/quote]

Thanks man, and i guess as long as it still runs fine theres no harm

Read full topic
